data.eml:eml: Two new species of Eutardigrada from Victoria Land, Antarctica

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lisi, Oscar (2017): Two new species of Eutardigrada from Victoria Land, Antarctica. Zootaxa 4317 (3): 541-558, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4317.3.6
